name: Portal Paralysis (SHOWCASE VERSION)
description:
Portal Paralysis is a Click 'n' Touch Puzzle game that is inspired by Riddle School and Riddle Transfer.

STAGES---------------------------------------------

Stage 1: Showcase (COMPLETE)

Stage 2: Demo (WORK IN PROGRESS)

Stage 3: Pre-Release (TO DO)

Stage 4: Fully Finished and Complete (TO DO)

Right Now The Planned Release Date is 02/08/22 (In America)
